channel.title: Trying to make a remix compilation for my album ‘journey’
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
I’m going to attempt to host a remix contest for my album, journey. Here’s how I think it’ll work:
- The project links are all right here: **https://www.dropbox.com/s/nwoynceu1adjpqa/project%20stems.pdf?dl=0** - People that want to do it can pick a song and go ahead. Please don’t plagiarise. - **The deadline is September 7th**, but I’ll extend it if a large amount of people aren’t done by then - I’d like to get at least one remix for every song, but there’s not much I can do if that doesn’t happen. - Artwork is at **https://www.dropbox.com/s/xem3n6ucbbibxma/album2alt.png?dl=0**. You can add your name it or whatever, as long as it’s a bit subtle. - **I’ll release an album with (ideally) my favorite remix of every song after the deadline.**
Have fun! [spoiler]Hope I get enough remixes to actually do this [/spoiler] And if you haven’t heard it, the album is release on Soundcloud [**here**](https://soundcloud.com/crystldawn/journey) and it’s coming to other stores on August 25th.

item.title: Trying to make a remix compilation for my album ‘journey’
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
I’m going to be putting this on hold until I figure out some personal things. If you haven’t submitted, you still can!

Read full topic

item.title: Trying to make a remix compilation for my album ‘journey’
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
Hi everyone!

I’m going to attempt to host a remix contest for my album, journey. Here’s how I think it’ll work:

  • The project links are all right here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nwoynceu1adjpqa/project%20stems.pdf?dl=0
  • People that want to do it can pick a song and go ahead. Please don’t plagiarise.
  • The deadline is September 7th, but I’ll extend it if a large amount of people aren’t done by then
  • I’d like to get at least one remix for every song, but there’s not much I can do if that doesn’t happen.
  • Artwork is at https://www.dropbox.com/s/xem3n6ucbbibxma/album2alt.png?dl=0. You can add your name it or whatever, as long as it’s a bit subtle.
  • I’ll release an album with (ideally) my favorite remix of every song after the deadline.

Have fun! spoiler
And if you haven’t heard it, the album is release on Soundcloud here and it’s coming to other stores on August 25th.
